price: I tako Mi Gospodara neba i Zemlje to je istina, kao što je istina da govorite!
arabic: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞ مِّثۡلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمۡ تَنطِقُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fawarabbi al-samāi wal-arḍi innahu laḥaqqun mith'la mā annakum tanṭiqūna
